name: Tiny Robot Factory
description:
Controls:

Activate the press using Down Arrow and switch the conveyor belt directions with Spacebar.

Summary:

Welcome to your first day at the Tiny Robot™ factory. Your Job here is pretty simple:

  • Send the blue robots to the blue pipe and the red ones to the red pipe.
  • If you see any of those pesky tall robots, be sure to smash them with the press. But be careful not to smash regular sized Tiny Robot™. Those things are expensive!

And don't forget the golden rule: 3 Strikes and you're out!

-Made in 72 hours for the Metal monstrosity GDL Game Jam.-

Music: Ride by Pocketmaster taken from freemusicarchive.org.
